readme.txt for A260_UHH18S

Experiment in using git and GitHub to maintain a few files for the ASTR/PHYS260 class for Spring 2018.

Commands used are:

git init
git add readme.txt (git add .)
git commit -m "brief summary of actions"
git commit -a (will add and commit in one step any modified but not new files)
git log 

Helpful Information

man git
man gittutorial
man giteveryday

https://git-scm.com
